info.title: OpenAlex API
info.description: The OpenAlex API provides access to a comprehensive catalog of scholarly works, authors, sources, institutions, topics, keywords, publishers, and funders. OpenAlex indexes over 250 million scholarly works.

tags.name: Works
tags.description: Scholarly documents like journal articles, books, datasets, and theses

tags.name: Authors
tags.description: People who create scholarly works

tags.name: Sources
tags.description: Journals, repositories, and other venues where works are hosted

tags.name: Institutions
tags.description: Universities, research organizations, and other affiliations

tags.name: Topics
tags.description: Research topics automatically assigned to works

tags.name: Keywords
tags.description: Short phrases identified from works' topics

tags.name: Publishers
tags.description: Companies and organizations that publish scholarly works

tags.name: Funders
tags.description: Organizations that fund research

tags.name: Autocomplete
tags.description: Fast typeahead search for any entity type

tags.name: Domains
tags.description: Top-level categories in the topic hierarchy (4 total)

tags.name: Fields
tags.description: Second-level categories in the topic hierarchy (26 total)

tags.name: Subfields
tags.description: Third-level categories in the topic hierarchy (254 total)

tags.name: SDGs
tags.description: UN Sustainable Development Goals (17 total)

tags.name: Countries
tags.description: Geographic countries for filtering research by location

tags.name: Continents
tags.description: Geographic continents (7 total)

tags.name: Languages
tags.description: Languages of scholarly works

tags.name: Awards
tags.description: Research grants and funding awards

tags.name: Concepts
tags.description: Legacy taxonomy of research areas (deprecated - use Topics instead)

tags.name: Work Types
tags.description: Types of scholarly works (article, book, dataset, etc.)

tags.name: Source Types
tags.description: Types of sources (journal, repository, conference, etc.)

tags.name: Institution Types
tags.description: Types of institutions (education, healthcare, company, etc.)

tags.name: Licenses
tags.description: Open access licenses (CC BY, CC BY-SA, etc.)

get.description: Get a list of scholarly works with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination. Works include journal articles, books, datasets, theses, and more.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `cited_by_count`, `publication_date`, `relevance_score` (with search). Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Work fields](/api-reference/works#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single work by its OpenAlex ID or external ID (DOI, PMID, PMCID, MAG ID). External IDs can be passed as full URLs or URN format (e.g., `doi:10.1234/example` or `pmid:12345678`).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: OpenAlex ID (e.g., W2741809807) or external ID (DOI, PMID, PMCID, MAG)

get.description: Get a list of authors with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`, `summary_stats.h_index`, `summary_stats.i10_index`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Author fields](/api-reference/authors#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single author by OpenAlex ID or ORCID.
Get a list of sources (journals, repositories, conferences) with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`, `summary_stats.h_index`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Source fields](/api-reference/sources#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single source by OpenAlex ID or ISSN.
Get a list of institutions with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`, `summary_stats.h_index`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Institution fields](/api-reference/institutions#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single institution by OpenAlex ID or ROR.
Get a list of topics with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination. Topics are research areas automatically assigned to works.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Topic fields](/api-reference/topics#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single topic by OpenAlex ID.
Get a list of keywords with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Keyword fields](/api-reference/keywords#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type. See [all Keyword fields](/api-reference/keywords#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single keyword by OpenAlex ID.
Get a list of publishers with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`, `summary_stats.h_index`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Publisher fields](/api-reference/publishers#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single publisher by OpenAlex ID.
Get a list of funders with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`, `awards_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Funder fields](/api-reference/funders#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single funder by OpenAlex ID or Crossref Funder ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: OpenAlex ID (e.g., F4320306076) or Crossref Funder ID

get.description: Fast typeahead search returning up to 10 results. Use for search-as-you-type interfaces.

**DEPRECATED:** This endpoint is deprecated and not recommended for new projects. It will not receive updates or support.

Classify arbitrary text to find relevant OpenAlex topics. Costs 1,000 credits per request.
Check your current rate limit status including credits used and remaining.
Get a list of domains (top-level topic categories). There are only 4 domains: Life Sciences, Social Sciences, Physical Sciences, and Health Sciences.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Domain fields](/api-reference/domains#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type. See [all Domain fields](/api-reference/domains#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single domain by its ID (1-4).
Get a list of fields (second-level topic categories). There are 26 fields spread across 4 domains.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Field fields](/api-reference/fields#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single field by its ID.
Get a list of subfields (third-level topic categories). There are 254 subfields spread across 26 fields.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Subfield fields](/api-reference/subfields#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single subfield by its ID.
Get a list of UN Sustainable Development Goals. There are 17 SDGs.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter SDGs. Examples: `id:3` (Good Health), `works_count:>100000` See [all SDG fields](/api-reference/sdgs#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all SDG fields](/api-reference/sdgs#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type. See [all SDG fields](/api-reference/sdgs#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single Sustainable Development Goal by its ID (1-17).
Get a list of countries. Useful for filtering works by author affiliation country.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Country fields](/api-reference/countries#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type. See [all Country fields](/api-reference/countries#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single country by its ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., US, GB, CN)

get.description: Get a list of continents (7 total).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Continent fields](/api-reference/continents#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type. See [all Continent fields](/api-reference/continents#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single continent by its Wikidata Q-ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Wikidata Q-ID (e.g., Q49 for North America)

get.description: Get a list of languages used in scholarly works.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Language fields](/api-reference/languages#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type. See [all Language fields](/api-reference/languages#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single language by its ISO 639-1 code.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ISO 639-1 language code (e.g., en, zh, es)

get.description: Get a list of research grants and funding awards.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `funded_outputs_count`, `amount`, `start_year`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Award fields](/api-reference/awards#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single award by its OpenAlex ID.
**DEPRECATED:** Use Topics instead. Get a list of concepts from the legacy taxonomy.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`, `level`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Concept fields](/api-reference/concepts#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: **DEPRECATED:** Use Topics instead. Retrieve a single concept by OpenAlex ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: OpenAlex ID (e.g., C41008148 for Computer Science)

get.description: Get a list of work types (article, book, dataset, etc.).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending.

get.description: Get a list of source types (journal, repository, conference, etc.).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending.

get.description: Get a list of institution types (education, healthcare, company, etc.).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending.

get.description: Get a list of open access licenses (CC BY, CC BY-SA, etc.).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending.

apiKey.name: api_key
apiKey.description: Your OpenAlex API key. Get a free key at https://openalex.org/settings/api

filter.name: filter
filter.description: Filter results using field:value syntax. Multiple filters can be combined with commas (AND) or pipes (OR). Available fields vary by entity type.

search.name: search
search.description: Full-text search across titles, abstracts, and other text fields. Example: `search=machine learning`

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Sort results by a field. Prefix with `-` for descending order. Available fields vary by entity type.

per_page.name: per_page
per_page.description: Number of results per page (1-200, default 25)

page.name: page
page.description: Page number for pagination. Use cursor for deep pagination beyond 10,000 results.

cursor.name: cursor
cursor.description: Cursor for deep pagination. Use `cursor=*` to start, then use the `next_cursor` from the response.

sample.name: sample
sample.description: Return a random sample of N results (max 10,000). Cannot be used with sort or page.

select.name: select
select.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return. Reduces response size. Example: `select=id,display_name,cited_by_count`

group_by.name: group_by
group_by.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type.

api_key.name: api_key
api_key.description: Your OpenAlex API key (required). Get a free key at https://openalex.org/settings/api

count.description: Total number of results matching the query

next_cursor.description: Cursor for the next page (when using cursor pagination)

groups_count.description: Number of groups when using group_by

count.description: Number of results in this group

Work.description: A scholarly document (article, book, dataset, thesis, etc.)

cited_by_count.description: Number of citations to this work

is_retracted.description: Whether this work has been retracted

is_paratext.description: Whether this is paratext (front matter, etc.)

authorships.description: List of authors and their affiliations (limited to first 100)

referenced_works.description: OpenAlex IDs of works cited by this work

topics.description: Top topics for this work (up to 3)

indexed_in.description: Sources this work is indexed in (crossref, pubmed, doaj, arxiv)

created_date.description: When this record was created in OpenAlex

updated_date.description: When this record was last updated

is_oa.description: Whether this location provides open access

version.description: Version of the work at this location

is_oa.description: Whether this work is open access

any_repository_has_fulltext.description: Whether any repository has the full text

Authorship.description: Author and their affiliation for a work

is_corresponding.description: Whether this is the corresponding author

raw_author_name.description: Author name as it appears in the work

Author.description: A person who creates scholarly works

works_count.description: Number of works by this author

cited_by_count.description: Total citations to this author's works

works_api_url.description: API URL to get this author's works

Source.description: A journal, repository, or other venue for scholarly works

is_oa.description: Whether this is an open access source

is_in_doaj.description: Whether in Directory of Open Access Journals

Institution.description: A university, research organization, or other affiliation

Topic.description: A research topic automatically assigned to works

Keyword.description: A keyword identified from works' topics

Publisher.description: An organization that publishes scholarly works

Domain.description: Top-level category in the topic hierarchy (4 total)

siblings.description: Other domains at the same level

Field.description: Second-level category in the topic hierarchy (26 total)

siblings.description: Other fields at the same level

Subfield.description: Third-level category in the topic hierarchy (254 total)

siblings.description: Other subfields at the same level

DehydratedAuthor.description: [Dehydrated Author](/api-reference/authors#the-dehydratedauthor-object)  reduced-field version used in nested contexts

DehydratedInstitution.description: [Dehydrated Institution](/api-reference/institutions#the-dehydratedinstitution-object)  reduced-field version used in nested contexts

DehydratedSource.description: [Dehydrated Source](/api-reference/sources#the-dehydratedsource-object)  reduced-field version used in nested contexts

DehydratedFunder.description: [Dehydrated Funder](/api-reference/funders)  reduced-field version used in nested contexts
